original_text: And Hezekiah commanded to offer the burnt offering upon the altar. And when the burnt offering began, the song of the Lord began also with the trumpets, and with the instruments ordained by David king of Israel.
korean_text: 히스기야가 명령하여 번제를 제단에 드릴새 번제 드리기를 시작하는 동시에 여호와의 시로 노래하고 나팔을 불며 이스라엘 왕 다윗의 악기를 울리고

sentences.original_text: And Hezekiah commanded to offer the burnt offering upon the altar.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 히스기야는 제단에 번제물을 드리라고 명령했습니다.

sentences.original_text: And when the burnt offering began,
the song of the Lord began also
and with the instruments ordained by David king of Israel.
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 왕 다윗이 명령한 악기와 함께입니다.
